{"id":378163901,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1596940796,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/378163901/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        while(true) {\n            for (int i = 0; i < (signed int)s.length() - 1; ++i) {\n                if ('a' <= s[i] && 'z' >= s[i] && s[i + 1] == toupper(s[i]) || \n                   'a' <= s[i + 1] && 'z' >= s[i + 1] && s[i] == toupper(s[i + 1])) {\n                    s[i] = '_';\n                    s[i + 1] = '_'; \n                    ++i; \n                }\n            }\n            \n            string news = \"\"; \n            for (char c : s) {\n                if (c != '_') {\n                    news += c; \n                }\n            }\n            \n            if (news.length() == s.length()) {\n                return news; \n            }\n            news.swap(s); \n        }\n        return s; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
